steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

steps.step2: Season the chicken breast halves with salt and place them in a baking dish.

steps.step3: In a bowl, mix the salsa and taco sauce. Pour this sauce mixture over the chicken breasts.

steps.step4: Bake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is no longer pink in the center.

steps.step5: Remove the baking dish from the oven and sprinkle the shredded Mexican cheese blend over the chicken. Return to the oven and bake for an additional 5 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

steps.step6: Serve the baked salsa chicken hot, garnished with extra salsa if desired.

ingredients: 10 bone-in chicken breast halves (10 ounces each)

steps.step1: In a large bowl, mix the cider vinegar, canola oil, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce to create the marinade.

steps.step2: Place the chicken breast halves in a large resealable plastic bag. Pour the marinade over the chicken and seal the bag. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.

steps.step3: Preheat your grill to medium heat.

steps.step4: Remove the chicken from the marinade and grill for about 6-8 minutes on each side or until the chicken is no longer pink and has nice grill marks.

steps.step5: Serve the grilled Kentucky chicken hot, garnished with your favorite side dishes.

ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (6 ounces each)

steps.step1: In a bowl, combine the creamy Caesar salad dressing, olive oil, Dijon mustard, and minced garlic cloves. Mix well to create the marinade.

steps.step2: Place the chicken breast halves in a large resealable plastic bag. Pour the marinade over the chicken and seal the bag. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to marinate.

steps.step3: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.

steps.step4: Remove the chicken from the marinade and grill for about 6-8 minutes on each side or until the chicken is no longer pink in the center.

steps.step5: Serve the grilled Caesar chicken breasts hot, garnished with your favorite sides and extra Caesar dressing if desired.

ingredients: 2 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (6 ounces each)

steps.step1: In a small bowl, mix together the sherry or chicken broth, reduced-sodium soy sauce, minced garlic, and ground ginger to create the teriyaki marinade.

steps.step2: Place the chicken breast halves in a resealable plastic bag or a shallow dish. Pour the teriyaki marinade over the chicken and seal the bag or cover the dish. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to marinate.

steps.step3: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.

steps.step4: Remove the chicken from the marinade and grill for about 6-8 minutes on each side or until the chicken is no longer pink in the center, and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).

steps.step1: In a mixing bowl, combine the tomato sauce, reduced-sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, and minced garlic to create the soy-garlic sauce.

steps.step2: Place the chicken leg quarters in a large resealable plastic bag or a shallow dish. Pour the soy-garlic sauce over the chicken, seal the bag or cover the dish, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to marinate.

steps.step3: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.

steps.step4: Remove the chicken from the marinade and grill for about 35-40 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (75°C). Baste with the marinade during grilling.

ingredients: 1 broiler/fryer chicken (3 to 4 pounds), cut up and skin removed
1 bottle (12 ounces) beer or nonalcoholic beer

steps.step1: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine 2 tablespoons of flour, onion soup mix, and a dash of pepper.

steps.step2: Add the chicken pieces to the bag and shake to coat the chicken with the flour mixture.

steps.step3: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Brown the chicken pieces on all sides.

steps.step4: Place the browned chicken in a slow cooker and pour beer over it. Cover and cook on LOW for 6-7 hours until the chicken is tender and thoroughly cooked.

ingredients: 6 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (6 ounces each)
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1/2 cup white wine or chicken broth

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

steps.step2: In a bowl, mix together the condensed cream of chicken soup and white wine or chicken broth.

steps.step3: Place the chicken breast halves in a greased baking dish. Pour the soup mixture over the chicken.

steps.step4: Lay a slice of Swiss cheese on top of each chicken breast.

steps.step5: Sprinkle the crushed seasoned croutons evenly over the cheese.

steps.step6: Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through, and the topping is golden and bubbly.

ingredients: 1 package sliced fajita vegetables (bell peppers and onions)

steps.step1: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.

steps.step2: Add the sliced fajita vegetables to the skillet and sauté until they become tender and slightly caramelized.

steps.step3: Stir in the no-salt-added black beans, salt-free Southwest-style seasoning blend, and a pinch of salt. Continue to cook, stirring, until the beans are heated through and the flavors are well combined.

steps.step4: Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed, adding more salt or seasoning blend if desired.

steps.step5: Serve the black bean fajita skillet hot and enjoy!

recipeList.recipeName: Baked Eggs in Tomato Sauce with Kale
ingredients: 1 25-ounce jar low-sodium marinara sauce or 3 cups canned low-sodium tomato sauce

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

steps.step2: In a large skillet, heat the low-sodium marinara sauce or canned tomato sauce over medium heat.

steps.step3: Add the frozen chopped kale to the sauce and stir in the salt and ground pepper. Cook until the kale is thawed and heated through.

steps.step4: Make eight small wells in the sauce and kale mixture using a spoon. Crack an egg into each well.

steps.step5: Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake until the egg whites are set but the yolks are still runny, about 10-15 minutes. Season with additional salt and pepper to taste, if desired.

ingredients: 2 8-ounce packages frozen or refrigerated cheese ravioli

steps.step1: Cook the cheese ravioli according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.

steps.step2: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the grape tomatoes and cook until they start to blister and soften.

steps.step3: Add the baby spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted.

steps.step4: Toss the cooked ravioli and pesto into the skillet with the tomatoes and spinach. Stir to combine and heat through.

steps.step5: Serve the Pesto Ravioli with Spinach & Tomatoes immediately and enjoy.

ingredients: ¼ cup slivered oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes

steps.step1: In a large skillet, heat the oil from the jar of sun-dried tomatoes over medium heat.

steps.step2: Add the sun-dried tomatoes and cook for a few minutes until they become fragrant and slightly crispy.

steps.step3: Add the chickpeas to the skillet and sauté until they are heated through.

steps.step4: Stir in the chopped kale and water. Cover the skillet and cook until the kale wilts and becomes tender.

steps.step5: Serve the 3-Ingredient Chickpeas with Kale & Sun-Dried Tomatoes immediately and enjoy.

recipeList.recipeName: Shaved Brussels Sprouts with Parmesan & Lemon
ingredients: 2 tablespoons pine nuts or sunflower seeds

steps.step1: Begin by trimming the ends of the Brussels sprouts and removing any damaged outer leaves.

steps.step2: Using a sharp knife or a food processor with a slicing attachment, thinly shave the Brussels sprouts.

steps.step3: In a large bowl, combine the shaved Brussels sprouts, grated parmesan cheese, and pine nuts or sunflower seeds.

steps.step4: Drizzle the olive oil and lemon juice over the mixture. Toss everything together to coat the ingredients evenly.

steps.step5: Serve the Shaved Brussels Sprouts with Parmesan & Lemon as a side dish, and enjoy the fresh and zesty flavors.

ingredients: 1 lb green beans, washed and trimmed

steps.step1: Start by washing and trimming the green beans. Remove any stems or ends that are tough.

steps.step2: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the green beans and sauté for about 5 minutes until they become tender but still crisp.

steps.step3: In the last minute of cooking, add the slivered almonds to the skillet. Continue to cook, stirring, until the almonds are lightly toasted.

steps.step4: Squeeze the juice from half a lemon over the green beans and almonds. Toss to combine, and season with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.step5: Transfer the 10 Minute Green Beans to a serving dish, and enjoy this quick and delicious dish.

ingredients: 1 large navel orange segmented with juices reserved
4 cups of mixed greens or spinach

steps.step1: Start by segmenting the navel orange. Cut off the top and bottom of the orange, then use a knife to remove the peel and pith. Hold the orange over a bowl to catch the juices, and carefully cut between the membranes to release the segments.

steps.step2: In a large salad bowl, combine the orange segments, pieces of avocado, and the mixed greens or spinach.

steps.step3: In a small bowl, whisk together the reserved orange juice and olive oil to make the dressing.

steps.step4: Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine all the ingredients.

steps.step5: Sprinkle the sliced almonds on top of the salad just before serving for added crunch and flavor. Enjoy your Avocado and Orange Salad!

ingredients: Rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar

steps.step1: Start by pressing the tofu to remove excess water. Place the block of tofu between paper towels or clean kitchen towels and put something heavy on top, like a cast-iron skillet. Let it press for about 15-30 minutes.

steps.step2: While the tofu is pressing, prepare the miso marinade. In a bowl, combine miso paste, maple syrup or agave nectar, rice vinegar or apple cider vinegar, and soy sauce. Mix well to form a smooth marinade.

steps.step3: After the tofu has been pressed, cut it into bite-sized cubes or slices, depending on your preference.

steps.step4: Place the tofu pieces in a container or a zip-top bag and pour the miso marinade over them. Ensure all tofu pieces are coated with the marinade. Seal the container or bag and refrigerate for at least 1-2 hours, allowing the tofu to marinate and absorb the flavors.

steps.step5: When ready to cook, preheat your oven or grill. Place the marinated tofu on skewers or a grill tray if using the grill. If using the oven, you can place the tofu on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Cook until the tofu is nicely browned and has a slightly crispy texture. Serve your delicious Miso Tofu with your favorite side dishes or enjoy it on its own.

steps.step1: Start by preparing the tofu. If you're using extra-firm tofu, press it to remove excess water. Then, cut the tofu into bite-sized cubes or strips, depending on your preference.

steps.step2: In a bowl, combine the teriyaki sauce and cornstarch. Mix well until the cornstarch is fully dissolved. This mixture will be used to thicken the teriyaki sauce during cooking.

steps.step3: In a large skillet or wok, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the tofu pieces and stir-fry them until they become golden brown and slightly crispy. This should take about 5-7 minutes.

steps.step4: Add your choice of stir-fry vegetables to the skillet. Common options include bell peppers, broccoli, snap peas, carrots, and more. Stir-fry the vegetables until they are tender-crisp, usually about 5-7 minutes.

steps.step5: Pour the teriyaki sauce mixture over the tofu and vegetables. Stir well to ensure everything is coated with the sauce. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, allowing the sauce to thicken and cling to the ingredients.

steps.step6: Serve your delicious Teriyaki Stir Fry over a bed of cooked rice or noodles. Garnish with sesame seeds, chopped green onions, or a drizzle of extra teriyaki sauce for added flavor.

ingredients: Taco Seasoning or seasoning of choice

steps.step1: Start by heating a non-stick skillet over medium heat. While the skillet is heating, warm the tortillas in a separate pan or in the oven. Keep them warm until you're ready to assemble the tacos.

steps.step2: In the skillet, add the black beans and season them with taco seasoning or your seasoning of choice. Sauté the beans until they are heated through and well-coated with the seasoning, usually about 3-5 minutes.

steps.step3: While the beans are cooking, prepare the toppings. Dice the avocado and tomatoes into small pieces.

steps.step4: Once the beans are ready, it's time to assemble the tacos. Lay out the warm tortillas and spoon the seasoned black beans onto each tortilla.

steps.step5: Top the beans with diced avocado and tomatoes. You can also add additional toppings like salsa, shredded cheese, sour cream, or fresh cilantro if desired.

steps.step6: Fold the tortillas in half, and your Black Bean Breakfast Tacos are ready to serve. Enjoy them as a quick and delicious breakfast or brunch!

recipeList.recipeName: Cheesy Chili Hash Brown Bake Recipe
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds lean ground beef or turkey
1/2 (30-oz.) package frozen country-style shredded hash browns (about 4 cups)

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish and set it aside.

steps.step2: In a large skillet, cook the lean ground beef or turkey over medium-high heat until it's browned and crumbled. Drain any excess fat.

steps.step3: Add the original sloppy joe sauce and chili with beans to the cooked meat. Stir and let the mixture simmer for a few minutes until it's heated through.

steps.step4: Place half of the frozen shredded hash browns in the prepared baking dish. Spoon the meat and sauce mixture over the hash browns.

steps.step5: Add the remaining hash browns on top of the meat. Sprinkle the shredded Cheddar cheese evenly over the casserole.

steps.step6: Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Then, remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes or until the casserole is hot and bubbly and the cheese is nicely melted and golden.

steps.step7: Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly before serving. Serve this Cheesy Chili Hash Brown Bake as a delicious and hearty meal.

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish and set it aside.

steps.step2: Cook the medium shell pasta according to the package instructions until it's al dente. Drain and set it aside.

steps.step3: In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium-high heat until it's browned and crumbled. Drain any excess fat.

steps.step4: In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked pasta, browned ground beef, and both cans of tomato soup. Mix well to evenly coat the pasta and beef.

steps.step5: Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish and spread it out evenly. Top with the grated cheddar and mozzarella cheese.

steps.step6: Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. Then, remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

steps.step7: Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly before serving. Serve this Hamburger Casserole as a comforting and cheesy meal.

ingredients: 1 can (10 ounces) diced tomatoes and green chiles, undrained
1 can (15 ounces) black beans, rinsed and drained

steps.step1: In a large skillet, cook the lean ground beef over medium-high heat until it's browned and crumbled. Drain any excess fat.

steps.step2: Add the diced tomatoes and green chiles to the cooked beef. Stir and cook for a few minutes until heated through.

steps.step3: In a separate saucepan, warm the refried beans over low heat, stirring occasionally.

steps.step4: Assemble the tostadas: Spread a layer of warmed refried beans onto each tostada shell. Top with the beef and tomato mixture, followed by black beans.

steps.step5: Serve the tostadas as an open-faced sandwich. You can garnish with your favorite toppings like shredded lettuce, cheese, sour cream, or salsa.

ingredients: 2 packages (16 ounces each) frozen mixed vegetables
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 pound ground beef, cooked and drained

steps.step1: In a large soup pot, combine the V8 juice and frozen mixed vegetables. Heat over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are heated through.

steps.step2: Stir in the condensed cream of mushroom soup and continue to heat the mixture until it's thoroughly combined and hot.

steps.step3: Add the cooked and drained ground beef to the soup. Mix well to incorporate the beef.

steps.step4: Sprinkle the dried minced onion into the soup and stir to distribute the flavor evenly.

steps.step5: Simmer the soup for a few minutes until all ingredients are hot and well combined. Serve and enjoy.

steps.step1: Cook the ramen noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.

steps.step2: Heat olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the beef mince and stir-fry until browned and cooked through.

steps.step3: Add the superfood vegetables stir-fry mix to the skillet and stir-fry for a few minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp.

steps.step4: Pour the teriyaki sauce over the beef and vegetable mixture. Stir well and let it simmer for a couple of minutes.

steps.step5: Serve the teriyaki beef and vegetable stir-fry over the cooked ramen noodles. Enjoy!

ingredients: 1 pound Ground Beef (93% lean or leaner)
4 slices white Cheddar, pepper Jack, smoked Gouda, or provolone cheese
4 whole wheat hamburger buns or pretzel rolls, split, toasted

steps.step1: Preheat your grill to medium heat.

steps.step2: In a mixing bowl, combine the ground beef, finely chopped red onion, and 2 tablespoons of barbecue sauce.

steps.step3: Shape the beef mixture into 4 patties of equal size.

steps.step4: Grill the patties for about 7-8 minutes per side, or to your desired level of doneness.

steps.step5: During the last minute of grilling, place a slice of cheese on each patty and toast the buns on the grill.

steps.step6: Spread the remaining barbecue sauce on the toasted buns, add the cheesy patties, and assemble your burgers.

steps.step7: Serve your zesty barbecue cheeseburgers hot and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 packet (1 ounce) dry ranch dressing mix
1 packet (.7 ounces) dry Italian salad dressing mix
1 packet (.7 ounces) dry Italian salad dressing mix

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).

steps.step2: Place the boneless beef chuck roast in a roasting pan.

steps.step3: Sprinkle the dry ranch dressing mix evenly over the roast.

steps.step4: Follow by sprinkling both packets of dry Italian salad dressing mix over the roast.

steps.step5: Cover the roasting pan with a lid or aluminum foil.

steps.step6: Bake the roast in the preheated oven for about 3 hours or until the meat is tender and can be easily shredded with a fork.

steps.step7: Once done, shred the beef with two forks, and it's ready to serve.

steps.step8: Enjoy your delicious and tender beef pot roast!

ingredients: 1 tin of cream of mushroom soup
1 large onion, halved and roughly chopped
Mashed potato and veggies to serve

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 180°C (356°F).

steps.step2: In a casserole dish, combine the chopped casserole steak, cream of mushroom soup, beef oxos, and chopped onion.

steps.step3: Mix everything together until well combined.

steps.step4: Cover the casserole dish and place it in the preheated oven. Bake for 2-2.5 hours, or until the steak is tender and the flavors have melded together.

steps.step5: Serve the beef casserole over mashed potatoes and veggies. Enjoy your delicious and hearty meal!

ingredients: 3 tablespoons light pasta sauce, such as Heart Smart

steps.step1: In a skillet, cook the lean ground beef until browned, breaking it into crumbles as it cooks.

steps.step2: Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they're tender and the beef is fully cooked.

steps.step3: Stir in the light pasta sauce and let it simmer for a few minutes to heat through.

steps.step4: Cut the baked russet potato open and fluff the inside with a fork.

steps.step5: Spoon the meat sauce mixture over the baked potato, and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy your delicious meat sauce topped baked potato!

ingredients: 1 pound beef Top Sirloin Boneless or Top Round Steak, cut 3/4 inch thick or Flank Steak
4 hoagie rolls (6 inches long each), split, toasted

steps.step1: Preheat your grill to medium heat (about 350-400°F or 175-200°C).

steps.step2: Season the beef steak with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.step3: Grill the steak over direct heat for about 6-7 minutes per side for medium-rare or until desired doneness is reached.

steps.step4: Remove the steak from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes. After resting, slice the steak into thin strips.

steps.step5: To assemble the sandwiches, spread non-creamy Caesar dressing on the toasted hoagie rolls. Layer with romaine lettuce, grilled steak slices, and shredded Parmesan cheese. Serve immediately and enjoy your Caesar Steak Sandwiches!

steps.step1: In a small bowl, mix together ketchup, honey, low-sodium soy sauce, and crushed garlic.

steps.step2: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.

steps.step3: Lightly oil the grill grate and place the pork chops on the grill.

steps.step4: Brush the pork chops with the honey garlic sauce and cook for about 6-7 minutes per side or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).

steps.step5: Serve the honey garlic pork chops with the remaining sauce as a glaze. Enjoy your delicious meal!

ingredients: 400 g piece of higher-welfare pork fillet

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 180°C/350°F/gas 4.

steps.step2: Peel and thinly slice the potatoes, and finely slice the fresh sage.

steps.step3: Cut the pork fillet into 1cm/0.4-inch slices, then bash them to 0.5cm/0.2-inch thick.

steps.step4: Layer the sliced potatoes in a baking dish, seasoning with salt, pepper, and half of the sage as you go.

steps.step5: Place the pork slices on top of the potatoes, and put a slice of prosciutto on each piece. Sprinkle over the Cheddar cheese and the remaining sage. Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until the top is golden and the pork is cooked through. Serve and enjoy!

steps.step1: Slice the ginger into thin strips.

steps.step2: In a bowl, mix together the ginger sauce ingredients: 2 tablespoons sake, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 tablespoon mirin, and 1 tablespoon sugar. Set aside.

steps.step3: Lightly coat the thinly sliced pork with flour.

steps.step4: Heat a pan over medium heat and add a bit of oil. Cook the pork slices until they are no longer pink.

steps.step5: Pour the ginger sauce over the cooked pork slices and add the ginger strips. Stir-fry for a couple of minutes until the sauce thickens. Serve your delicious Ginger Pork (Shogayaki) over steamed rice and enjoy!

ingredients: 1/2 cup sriracha chilli sauce (or any spicy sauce you prefer)
1kg (2 lb) rack of pork spare ribs, cut into individual ribs

steps.step1: Cut the rack of pork spare ribs into individual ribs. This makes them easier to handle during cooking.

steps.step2: Lightly season the ribs with sea salt to enhance their flavor.

steps.step3: In a bowl, combine the hoisin sauce, ketchup, and sriracha chilli sauce (or your preferred spicy sauce). Mix them together thoroughly to create the sticky sauce.

steps.step4: Generously coat each rib with the sticky sauce. Ensure that every rib is evenly covered.

steps.step5: Place the sauced ribs in a large resealable plastic bag or a covered container. Allow them to marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1-2 hours, or overnight for the best flavor. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat, ensuring the grates are clean and lightly oiled to prevent sticking.

steps.step6: Grill the marinated ribs for about 20-30 minutes, turning them occasionally. Baste the ribs with any remaining sauce as they cook. The ribs are ready when they're cooked through and have a nice caramelized coating.

steps.step7: Transfer the sticky ribs to a serving platter. You can garnish them with some extra sauce for dipping if desired. These delicious sticky ribs are perfect for a barbecue or as a flavorful appetizer. Enjoy!

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).

steps.step2: Season the pork tenderloin generously with kosher salt, black pepper, and Italian seasoning. You can also add fresh rosemary sprigs for additional flavor, if desired.

steps.step3: Place the seasoned pork tenderloin in a roasting pan or on a baking sheet.

steps.step4: Roast the pork tenderloin in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).

steps.step5: Once the pork is cooked to your desired level of doneness, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing. Serve the roasted pork tenderloin with your favorite side dishes and enjoy!

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

steps.step2: In a shallow bowl, beat the egg.

steps.step3: In another shallow bowl, combine the bread crumbs and grated Parmesan cheese.

steps.step4: Dip each pork chop into the beaten egg, allowing excess to drip off, then coat it with the breadcrumb-Parmesan mixture, pressing it onto the pork to adhere.

steps.step5: Place the coated pork chops on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes or until the pork is cooked through and the coating is golden and crispy. Serve with lemon wedges for extra flavor. Enjoy your Parmesan Crusted Pork Chops!

ingredients: 2 x 250 g higher-welfare pork chops , with rind
1 x 410 g tin of peach halves in juice

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 200°C/180°C fan/gas 6 (392°F/356°F fan).

steps.step2: Place the pork chops in a large ovenproof pan and sear them over high heat until golden brown on both sides.

steps.step3: Add the minced garlic and rosemary sprigs to the pan and cook for a minute until fragrant.

steps.step4: Pour in the peach halves with their juice and bourbon. Season with salt and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil.

steps.step5: Transfer the pan to the preheated oven and roast for about 25-30 minutes until the pork is cooked through, and the sauce has thickened. Serve the peachy pork chops with the delicious sauce. Enjoy your meal!

ingredients: 1.5 kg (3 1/3 lb.) of pork shoulder roast, bone-in

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 150°C (300°F).

steps.step2: In a small bowl, mix together the brown sugar, chili powder, and smoked paprika to create a dry rub.

steps.step3: Rub the dry spice mixture all over the pork shoulder roast, ensuring it's well coated.

steps.step4: Place the seasoned pork roast in a roasting pan and pour the chicken stock around it.

steps.step5: Cover the pan with foil and roast in the preheated oven for 4-5 hours, or until the pork is tender and falls apart easily. Once done, shred the pork using two forks. Serve as a delicious pulled pork dish.

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

steps.step2: In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed buttery rounds crackers and Onion Onion™ Seasoning.

steps.step3: Add the ketchup and Bayou Bourbon™ Glaze to the cracker mixture and mix until well combined.

steps.step4: Add the ground meatloaf mixture to the bowl and mix until all the ingredients are evenly incorporated.

steps.step5: Place the meatloaf mixture into a greased loaf pan and bake in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the meatloaf is cooked through. Let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

ingredients: 4 1 1/4 pounds bone-in center-cut pork loin pork chops

steps.step1: Start by seasoning the pork chops with salt and pepper. Dredge each chop in all-purpose flour.

steps.step2: In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium-high heat. Add the pork chops and cook for about 4-5 minutes per side, or until they're nicely browned and cooked through. Remove the chops from the skillet and set them aside.

steps.step3: In the same skillet, add mango chutney, dijon mustard, and fat-free low-sodium chicken broth. Stir well and bring the mixture to a simmer.

steps.step4: Return the pork chops to the skillet and let them simmer in the sauce for an additional 5-7 minutes, ensuring they are heated through.

steps.step5: Serve the pork chops with the chutney sauce drizzled over the top. Enjoy!

recipeList.recipeName: Baked Fish with Lemon Butter Sauce

steps.step1: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

steps.step2: Place the white fish fillets on a baking sheet. Drizzle them with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

steps.step3: Bake the fish in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes or until they are cooked through and easily flake with a fork.

steps.step4: While the fish is baking, prepare the lemon butter sauce. In a saucepan, melt the butter over low heat. Squeeze the juice of one lemon into the melted butter, and add the garlic paste. Stir well and let it simmer for a couple of minutes.

steps.step5: Once the fish is done baking, drizzle the lemon butter sauce over the fillets. Serve immediately, and enjoy your baked fish with a delicious lemon butter sauce!

steps.step1: Start by cleaning and preparing the octopus. You can ask your fishmonger to clean it for you or follow an online guide for cleaning and prepping octopus.

steps.step2: In a large pot, bring water to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to a simmer, and add the cleaned octopus. Cook the octopus for about 1-2 hours or until it is tender. The cooking time can vary depending on the size and tenderness of the octopus.

steps.step3: While the octopus is cooking, in a separate pan, warm the white beans. You can use canned white beans for convenience.

steps.step4: Once the octopus is tender, remove it from the pot and let it cool slightly. Then, cut it into bite-sized pieces.

steps.step5: In a serving platter, arrange the white beans and the octopus pieces. Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the dish and garnish with chopped fresh parsley. Serve with lemon wedges on the side. Enjoy your delicious Octopus with Beans!

ingredients: 4 oz (110 g) butter, at room temperature

steps.step1: Start by preheating your grill to high heat.

steps.step2: In a bowl, mix the softened butter, crushed garlic, lemon juice, and chopped parsley to create the garlic stuffing.

steps.step3: Place the cleaned mussels on a baking tray and top each mussel with a small amount of the garlic stuffing mixture.

steps.step4: Place the mussels under the grill for about 3-5 minutes or until the garlic stuffing is bubbling and lightly browned.

steps.step5: Serve the mussels with garlic stuffing immediately, and enjoy your delicious seafood dish!

steps.step1: Peel and devein the shrimp, leaving the tails on. Rinse and pat dry with paper towels.

steps.step2: In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and diced onions. Sauté until the onions are translucent.

steps.step3: While the garlic and onions are cooking, mash the salted egg yolks into a fine paste.

steps.step4: Add the mashed salted egg yolks to the pan and stir to combine with the garlic and onions.

steps.step5: Add the cleaned shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink and are coated with the salted egg mixture. Serve hot and enjoy your delicious Salted Egg Shrimp!

steps.step1: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until it's al dente. Drain and set aside.

steps.step2: In a large skillet, heat some olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for a minute or until fragrant.

steps.step3: Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.

steps.step4: Add the mussels and pasta sauce to the skillet. Cover and simmer until the mussels open, about 5 minutes.

steps.step5: Toss the cooked pasta with the seafood and sauce. Serve hot and enjoy your delicious Seafood Pasta!

ingredients: 1/2 kilo fresh tuna cut into big cubes
Juice of 1 lemon or juice of 5 pcs calamansi juice

steps.step1: In a bowl, combine the fresh tuna cubes, prawns, and the calamansi juice (or lemon juice). Allow them to marinate for about 30 minutes.

steps.step2: Thread the marinated seafood, quartered onions, and tomatoes onto skewers, alternating the ingredients to your preference.

steps.step3: Preheat a grill to medium-high heat. You can also use a stovetop grill pan.

steps.step4: Grill the seafood kebabs for about 3-4 minutes on each side or until the seafood is cooked through and has grill marks.

steps.step5: Serve your delicious seafood kebabs hot. You can accompany them with your favorite dipping sauce or side dishes. Enjoy!

steps.step1: Prepare the seafood: Clean and devein the shrimp. Clean the squid and slice it into rings. Rinse the mussels thoroughly.

steps.step2: In a large wok or skillet, heat a bit of cooking oil over high heat. Add the prepared seafood and stir-fry for about 2-3 minutes until they turn pink and opaque. Remove the seafood from the wok and set it aside.

steps.step3: In the same wok, add a bit more cooking oil. Add the chopped spring onions and stir-fry for a minute until they become fragrant and slightly tender.

steps.step4: Return the cooked seafood to the wok with the spring onions. Add soy sauce and continue to stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes to combine the flavors.

steps.step5: Serve your delicious mixed seafood stir-fry hot over steamed rice or noodles. Garnish with additional spring onions, if desired, and enjoy!

ingredients: 1 pouch (6.4 ounces) light tuna in water
1/3 cup plus 1/2 cup dry bread crumbs, divided

steps.step1: In a mixing bowl, combine 3 tablespoons of all-purpose flour and 1 cup of evaporated milk. Mix until you have a smooth batter.

steps.step2: Add 1 pouch of light tuna in water to the batter. Mix until the tuna is well incorporated.

steps.step3: Stir in 1 finely chopped green onion into the mixture.

steps.step4: Gradually add 1/3 cup of dry bread crumbs to the mixture and stir until it thickens. If the mixture is too wet, you can add more bread crumbs until you achieve a consistency that can be shaped into patties.

steps.step5: Shape the mixture into patties, coat them with the remaining 1/2 cup of dry bread crumbs, and then fry them in a pan until they're golden brown on both sides. Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

steps.step1: Cook 2 cups of rice according to package instructions and allow it to cool.

steps.step2: In a large pan or wok, heat some oil over medium heat. Add 1 cup of cooked and peeled shrimp and stir-fry until they turn pink. Remove the shrimp from the pan and set them aside.

steps.step3: In the same pan, add diced vegetables of your choice, such as bell peppers, carrots, and peas. Stir-fry until they start to soften.

steps.step4: Add the cooked rice to the pan with the vegetables. Stir-fry and toss the rice to combine it with the vegetables.

steps.step5: Add 2 cups of diced pineapple, the cooked shrimp, and the juice of one lime to the pan. Stir-fry for a few more minutes until everything is heated through and well mixed. Serve your delicious Thai pineapple fried rice hot.

steps.step1: Cook your favorite pasta according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.

steps.step2: In a large pan, heat some olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for a minute or until fragrant.

steps.step3: Add diced tomatoes to the pan and cook for a few minutes until they start to soften.

steps.step4: Stir in a can of tuna and pasta sauce of your choice. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes until the sauce is heated through.

steps.step5: Combine the cooked pasta with the tuna and tomato sauce in the pan. Toss everything together until well mixed. Serve your delicious tuna pasta hot, and you can garnish it with fresh herbs or grated Parmesan cheese if you like.
